column2: #Dropping unneeded variables, removing injuries from Sports or Recreation Places, and filtering out injuries with missing info (sex, race, location)
select(-c(case_num, trmt_date, race_other, diag_other, fmv, prod1, prod2, disposition, stratum, psu, weight)) %>%
#Additional group separation for further data exploration
mutate(young_age = age < 15, teen_age = age > 15 & age < 30, middle_age = age > 30 & age < 45, old_age = age >45 & age < 60)
